name: corporately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
by a large company: Many of the school's activities are corporately sponsored. They live in a corporately owned house near the airport.
acting together as a group and not as separate people: Our members have made a great contribution, both corporately and individually. The government must respond quickly and corporately to make the necessary reforms.
More examplesFewer examplesI prefer to get my coffee from an independent store rather than one of those corporately run places.About 15 percent of doctors in the country work for corporately-owned medical centres.The task is way beyond our capabilities, both individually and corporately.
